summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the making, levy and collection of a supplemental assessment or reassessment to provide for the deficiency in the fund created to pay the cost and expense of the improvement of 9th Avenue South and other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 44472, creating Local Improvement District No. 3444.
committee: Streets and Sewers, Committee of Whole
